createPlotsBySelectorPromise

src/plotutil.js

Returns an array of Promises, one per selected element. This assumes each element has some combination of start, end, duration, net, sta, loc, and chan attributes sufficient to form the data query. Or an href to a miniseed file.

createPlotsBySelectorPromise(selector: string): Promise<Array<PlotDataType>>
Parameters
selector (string) css selector
Returns
Promise<Array<PlotDataType>>: promise to array of plot data types
